name: Hot Artichoke & Sundried Tomato Appies

ingredients.name: Spinach & Artichoke Hot Dip or Her & Garlic Dip

preparation: On a Sheet Pan Liner, roll puff pastry into a 10.5” square. Cut into triangles.
Spoon Hot Dip onto each triangle: 1⁄2 tsp for small, 1–2 tsp for large. Sprinkle each with sundried tomatoes.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Using a basting brush, brush with milk, and bake until puffy and light golden: 10–11 minutes for small, 12–14 minutes for large.

products.name: Spinach & Artichoke Hot Dip Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: This is the stuff of game day get-togethers, happy hours, and movie nights. Level up any charcuterie board with this creamy, cheesy, hot dip, perfect for dunking tortilla chips and slathering on fresh baguette.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: Sheet Pan
